test-case.name: embedded-stylesheet-001
test-case.description: Test case to verify that in a embedded standard stylesheet module, standard attribute (xsl:xpath-default-namespace) appearing on ancestors of the outermost element of the stylesheet module has no effect.

test-case.name: embedded-stylesheet-002
test-case.description: Test case to verify that in a embedded standard stylesheet module, standard attribute (xsl:use-when) appearing on ancestors of the outermost element of the stylesheet module has no effect.

test-case.name: embedded-stylesheet-003
test-case.description: Test case to verify that in a embedded standard stylesheet module, standard attribute (xsl:version) appearing on ancestors of the outermost element of the stylesheet module has no effect.

test-case.name: embedded-stylesheet-004
test-case.description: Test case to verify that in a embedded standard stylesheet module, standard attribute (xsl:exclude-result-prefixes) appearing on ancestors of the outermost element of the stylesheet module have no effect.

test-case.name: embedded-stylesheet-005
test-case.description: Test case in which an embedded standard stylesheet imports a standalone standard stylesheet.

test-case.name: embedded-stylesheet-006
test-case.description: Test case in which an embedded standard stylesheet includes a standalone standard stylesheet.

test-case.name: embedded-stylesheet-007
test-case.description: Test case in which an embedded standard stylesheet imports a standalone simplified stylesheet.

test-case.name: embedded-stylesheet-008
test-case.description: Test case in which an embedded standard stylesheet includes a standalone simplified stylesheet.

test-case.name: embedded-stylesheet-009
test-case.description: Test case to verify that it is not intrinsically an error for an embedded stylesheet to import the same module more than once.

test-case.name: embedded-stylesheet-010
test-case.description: Test case in which an included stylesheet declares an exclude-result-prefixes attribute, but the embedded stylesheet that includes it does not declare any exclude-result-prefixes attribute. This is to verify that the values of the standard attribute exclude-result-prefixes that apply to an element in the included stylesheet module are those that were defined on their own xsl:stylesheet element, not those on the main (Embedded) stylesheet module.

test-case.name: embedded-stylesheet-011
test-case.description: Test case in which an imported stylesheet declares an exclude-result-prefixes attribute, but the embedded stylesheet that imports has an exclude-result-prefixes attribute with a different value. This is to verify that the values of the standard attribute exclude-result-prefixes that apply to an element in the imported stylesheet module are those that were defined on their own xsl:stylesheet element, not those on the main (Embedded) stylesheet module.

test-case.name: embedded-stylesheet-012
test-case.description: Test case in which an embedded stylesheet has declared an xpath-default-namespace, but the stylesheet it imports has declared a different xpath-default-namespace. This is to verify that the values of the standard attribute xpath-default-namespace that apply to an element in the embedded stylesheet module are those that were defined on their own xsl:stylesheet element, not those on the imported stylesheet module.

test-case.name: embedded-stylesheet-013
test-case.description: Test case in which an embedded stylesheet has declared an xpath-default-namespace, but the stylesheet it includes has declared a different xpath-default-namespace. This is to verify that the values of the standard attribute xpath-default-namespace that apply to an element in the embedded stylesheet module are those that were defined on their own xsl:stylesheet element, not those on the included stylesheet module.
